model

alias of cube.models.products.Release

class cube.views.releases.ReleaseView(**kwargs)

Shows 4 validation steps for a release of a product: step 1 : checks that licence metadata are present and correct step 2 : checks that all licences have been reviewed by legal dpt step 3 : resolves choices in case of multi-licences step 4 : checks that chosen licences are compatible with policy and derogs

get_context_data(**kwargs)

Insert the single object into the context dict.

get_queryset()

Return the QuerySet that will be used to look up the object.

This method is called by the default implementation of get_object() and may not be called if get_object() is overridden.

model

alias of cube.models.products.Release

model

alias of cube.models.components.Usage

cube.views.releases.release_add_derogation(request, release_id, usage_id)

Takes the user to the page that allows them to add a derogation for the release they’re working on.

Parameters

  • request (HttpRequest) – mandatory

  • release_id (django AutoField) – The id of this release

  • usage_id (django AutoField) – The id of this usage

Returns

Renders the context into the template.

Return type

HttpResponse

cube.views.releases.release_send_derogation(request, release_id, usage_id)

Digests inputs from the associated form and send it to the database.

Parameters

  • request (HttpRequest) – mandatory

  • release_id (django AutoField) – The id of this release

  • usage_id (django AutoField) – The id of this usage

Returns

A redirection to this release main page.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect

Exports

cube.views.exports.export_licenses(request)

Calls API to retrieve list of licenses. Handles DRF pagination.

Returns

HttpResponse that triggers the download of a JSON file containing every license in a JSON Array.

Return type

DjangoHttpResponse
